attributes.action: Urge president Fidel Castro Ruz to release human rights activist Dr. Oscar Elias Biscet and restore his rights as a Cuban citizen.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: We can not accept petitions about individual cases. You may want to put your concerns in writing to the Foreign Secretary.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
